general.what food is this?: This is a sunny side up egg.
general.what are the ingredients present in this:
Sunny side up egg - 
 
 You will need: 
 ‚Ä¢ Eggs 
 ‚Ä¢ Oil 
 ‚Ä¢ Salt 
 ‚Ä¢ Pepper.
general.what are the cooking actions?:
Sunny side up egg in 5 steps- 
 
 1. Heat --> Oil 
 
 2. Crack --> Eggs 
 
 3. Cook --> Eggs 
 
 4. Season Eggs --> Salt and Pepper 
 
 5. Lift up with spatula --> Final Egg
general.give me step-by-step instructions:
1) Heat [Oil] in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat. 
2) Crack [Eggs] gently into the skillet, ensuring the yolks remain intact. 
3) Cook [Eggs] for about 2-3 minutes, until the whites are set but the yolks are still runny. 
4) Season [Eggs] with [Salt] and [Pepper] to taste. 
5) Carefully slide a spatula under [Eggs] and transfer them to a plate. 
6) Serve immediately and enjoy!
general.identify this food: This is a classic Mediterranean salad with feta, olives, and cucumbers.
general.cooking actions for these?:
Mediterranean Salad actions - 
 
 1. Wash --> Cherry tomatoes, Cucumbers, Red onion 
 2. Slice --> Cherry tomatoes 
 3. Chop --> Cucumbers 
 4. Thinly slice --> Red onion 
 5. Crumble --> Feta cheese 
 6. Add --> Kalamata olives 
 7. Whisk --> Olive oil, Oregano 
 8. Drizzle --> Dressing over salad 
 9. Toss --> Salad until well combined 
 10. Taste and adjust --> Seasoning with salt and pepper
general.give me the full recipe now:
Ingredients üìù: 
 
 ‚Ä¢ Cherry tomatoes 
 ‚Ä¢ Cucumbers 
 ‚Ä¢ Red onion 
 ‚Ä¢ Feta cheese 
 ‚Ä¢ Kalamata olives 
 ‚Ä¢ Olive oil 
 ‚Ä¢ Oregano 
 
 Recipe üìí: 
 
1) Wash [Cherry tomatoes, Cucumbers, Red onion] thoroughly under cold water. 
2) Slice [Cherry tomatoes] in half and place them in a large mixing bowl. 
3) Peel [Cucumbers] (if desired) and chop them into bite-sized pieces. 
4) Thinly slice [Red onion] and add it to the bowl. 
5) Crumble [Feta cheese] over the top of the vegetables. 
6) Add [Kalamata olives], either whole or halved, depending on your preference. 
7) Whisk [Olive oil, Oregano] in a small bowl to make a dressing. 
8) Drizzle the dressing over the salad ingredients. 
9) Gently toss [Salad] until well combined, being careful not to break [Feta cheese] too much. 
10) Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper if desired.
11) Serve immediately and enjoy your fresh Mediterranean salad!

general.what should i eat today?:
Today is Hug a Vegetarian Day‚ÄîSeptember 27, 2024, the last Friday in September! üéâ In honor of this day, why not try a delicious vegetarian recipe to celebrate? 

 **Recipe: Veggie Stir-Fry with Tofu** 

 **Ingredients:** 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 block firm tofu (pressed and cubed) 
 ‚Ä¢ 2 tbsp soy sauce 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 tbsp sesame oil (or any cooking oil) 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 red bell pepper, sliced 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 zucchini, sliced 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 carrot, thinly sliced 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 cup broccoli florets 
 ‚Ä¢ 2 garlic cloves, minced 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 tbsp ginger, minced 
 ‚Ä¢ 2 tbsp soy sauce (for sauce) 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 tbsp hoisin sauce (optional) 
 ‚Ä¢ 1 tbsp sesame seeds 
 ‚Ä¢ Cooked rice or noodles (for serving) 

 **Instructions:** 
 1) Press and cube [Tofu], then marinate it in [Soy sauce] for 10 minutes. 
 2) Heat [Sesame oil] in a pan, then saut√© [Tofu] until golden on all sides. Set it aside. 
 3) Saut√© [Garlic, Ginger] in the same pan until fragrant, then add [Bell pepper, Zucchini, Carrot, Broccoli] and stir-fry for about 5 minutes. 
 4) Add [Soy sauce, Hoisin sauce] to the vegetables, mixing well. Toss in [Tofu] and stir until everything is coated in sauce. 
 5) Garnish with [Sesame seeds] and serve over [Rice or noodles]. 

 Enjoy this vibrant, healthy dish, perfect for celebrating Hug a Vegetarian Day! üå±
